titleStmt.title: The merry vviues of Windsor With the humours of Sir Iohn Falstaffe, as also the swaggering vaine of ancient Pistoll, and Corporall Nym. Written by William Shake-speare. Newly corrected.
titleStmt.author: Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] H[arper] for R. Meighen, and are to be sold at his shop, next to the Middle-Temple Gate, and in S. Dunstans Church-yard in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
